definition: Aisin Gioro, family name of the Manchu emperors of the Qing dynasty
to love/to be fond of/to like/affection/to be inclined (to do sth)/to tend to (happen)

new/newly/meso- (chemistry)
a nap/a sleep/CL:場|场[chang2]

surname Luo

sentences.english: There are reported descendents of Aisin Gioro present in China today.
sentences.chinese: 據報道目前愛新覺羅家在中國還有後裔。

sentences.english: Aisin Gioro descendents now are from other branches of the family.
sentences.chinese: 愛新覺羅家現存後裔都是旁支。

sentences.english: The last Imperial family was the Qing Imperial family Aisin Gioro and the last Chinese Emperor was Puyi.
sentences.chinese: 最後的皇室是清皇試冬愛新覺羅莢冬溥儀是末代天子。

definition: Puyi, personal name of the last Qing emperor (reigned as child 1909-1911), the subject of Bertolucci's biopic The Last Emperor
Zhu Qizhen, personal name of sixth and eighth Ming emperor Zhengtong 正統|正统[Zheng4 tong3], afterwards Tianshun Emperor 天順|天顺[Tian1 shun4] (1427-1464), reigned 1435-1449 and 1457-1464
imperial edict
Nurhaci (1559-1626), founder and first Khan of the Manchu Later Jin dynasty 後金|后金 (from 1616)
Governor of Guangdong and Guangxi
to act as regent

regent
